abstract: Hugh Freeze, prominent figure in Michael Lewis book The Blind Side, has already made his mark on Arkansas State football team in his first full season as head coach; Arkansas State is on cusp of becoming eligible for a bowl game for the first time since 2008.
snippet: In his first full season as a head coach at Arkansas State, Hugh Freeze has the Red Wolves on the cusp of becoming eligible for a bowl game for the first time since 2008.
lead_paragraph: In his first full season as a head coach at Arkansas State, Hugh Freeze has the Red Wolves on the cusp of becoming eligible for a bowl game for the first time since 2008.

headline.main: Coach From ‘Blind Side’ Thrives in College Game
headline.print_headline: The Coach From ‘The Blind Side’ Turns the Page
headline.seo: Coach From ‘Blind Side’ Thrives in College Game
